title: American Gangster [2007] [Eng] [Unrated] -Hammer71
description:
American Gangster (2007) (Unrated)

Avi Size (MB) .........: 701.09 MB

Video Length ..........: 02:55:51 (176 Minutes)

Video Codec ...........: XVID (2 Pass)
Video Bitrate .........: 495 KB/s (four-nine-five)
Framerate .............: 23.976 FPS
(more infomation below)

Resolution ............: 560 x 304
Aspect Ratio ..........: 1.84:1

Audio Codec ...........: (MP3) (STEREO)
Audio Bitrate .........: 61 KB/s (VBR)
(more information below)

Audio Language ........: English
Subtitles .............: (see information below)

CD-R Tested ...........: Memorex CD-R (52x 700mb 80mins)
Player Tested .........: Magnavox MWD7006

Surround Sound Test ...: MTX Home Theater

Let me first say, this movie was tough to try to reproduce in 700mbs, yet fun!
:-)

I wanted to see what could be done with such a monster of a lengthy movie.

*Subtitles*
There are English Hard-Coded subtitles for the few non-English lines in the movie.

*Video*
495 KB/s Video Bitrate seems rather low, but the movie
itself doesn&#039;t have many fast action scenes in it.
Thus, allowing me to find a very good setting for the resolution.

The only few trouble spots that I saw were during a few of the club scenes.
Mainly the flashing lights and mood lighting, but there are only a few scenes
that take place in the clubs.

*Audio*
61 KB/s(VBR) might seem rather odd and a low setting.
I tested and watched this version in my home theater.
I was not dissapointed at all.

All the sound effects, such as cars driving by,
a gun being shot or even music in the dance club, are 100% intact.

Enjoy!
